name: Broken Bytes
description:
This is my submission for the last art assignment of the qualification phase 2. 

It's a platformer, where the levels are more corrupted the further you progress in the game.

This is also my first game and any feedback is appreciated, so I can improve my skillset, since I intend to keep making games as a hobby.

If you find bugs or have general feedback, leave them in the discussion board below!

Have fun!
